messages.title: Standing up for the many, not the few
messages.content: We need a strong, trusted local voice for the community to fight for us in Parliament

messages.title: Warrington Schools Are Seriously Underfunded and Facing £4 Million Cuts
messages.content: Tory Government funding of schools deliberately robs Warrington South pupils of the cash they deserve.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will invest in the future of young people and abolish student tuition fees from September.
Faisal will fight for justice for 1950s born women hit by rises in state pension age.
Invest in the National Health Service and stop the Tory cuts.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's official! It's a two horse race in Warrington South between the Tories and Labour. It's neck and neck this time with the LibDems trailing behind.

issues.education: Labour will invest in the future of young people and abolish student tuition fees from September. Warrington schools are seriously underfunded and facing £4 million cuts.
issues.health: Invest in the National Health Service and stop the Tory cuts.
issues.socialWelfare: Faisal will fight for justice for 1950s born women hit by rises in state pension age.

community.content: We need a strong, trusted local voice for the community to fight for us in Parliament.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in Warrington for almost 20 years. This is my home and my family and I will continue to live here. I am proud to serve the people of Warrington as their local MP.

politicalExperience.achievements: He is an experienced councillor with a strong track record.

endorsements.endorsement: Faisal is a great hardworking parliamentary candidate for Warrington South.
Faisal is a great parliamentary candidate for Warrington South. I am confident that he will be a strong voice for local people and wish him all the best.
We are supporting Faisal because he is hard working and genuine, does a great job of engaging with people locally and really cares about people in Warrington South.

images.caption: At the Cobbs Infant and Nursery School, Appleton
Listening to local resident Sheila in Old Hall

examples: Warrington schools are seriously underfunded and facing £4 million cuts.
Standing up for the many, not the few.
We need a strong, trusted local voice for the community to fight for us in Parliament.
I want the best representation, deal and services for Warrington South.
Tory Government funding of schools deliberately robs Warrington South pupils of the cash they deserve.
Labour will invest in the future of young people and abolish student tuition fees from September.
Faisal will fight for justice for 1950s born women hit by rises in state pension age.
Invest in the National Health Service and stop the Tory cuts.

personalStories.story: I have lived in Warrington for almost 20 years. This is my home and my family and I will continue to live here.

examples: Faisal is a great hardworking parliamentary candidate for Warrington South.
Faisal is a great parliamentary candidate for Warrington South. I am confident that he will be a strong voice for local people and wish him all the best.
We are supporting Faisal because he is hard working and genuine, does a great job of engaging with people locally and really cares about people in Warrington South.
Tory Government funding of schools deliberately robs Warrington South pupils of the cash they deserve.
Whether young, working, disabled or retired you are facing a Tory triple whammy of cuts, tax rises and a huge increase in the cost of social care.
